injectables.name: PokemonService

components.name: AppComponent

styleUrlsData.data: // Styles for app component if needed

components.name: ColorfulTagComponent
DetailsHeaderComponent
components.templateData:
{{pokemon.name}}

{{pokemon.id | number:'3.0-0'}}

{{getDescription().text}}

read more

components.name: EvolutionChainCardComponent
components.templateData:
Evolution Chain

{{pokemon.name | titlecase}}

components.name: FilterComponent
components.templateData:

Type

components.name: HeaderComponent
components.templateData:
Pokdex

components.name: HomeComponent
components.templateData:

Search for any Pokmon that exists on the planet

components.name: LoaderComponent
MultiSelectDropdownComponent
components.templateData:
{{label}}
{{(selectControl.value?.length || 0) ? ((selectControl.value?.length || 0) + ' Selected') : placeholder}} {{item.label}}

components.name: PokemonCardComponent
components.templateData:
#{{getPokemonNumber(data.id)}}
{{data.name | titlecase}}
{{type.type.name | titlecase}}

components.name: PokemonDetailsComponent
PropertyCardComponent
components.templateData:
Height
{{pokemon.height}}
Weight
{{pokemon.weight / 10}} Kg
Abilities
{{getAbilities()}}
Moves
{{getMoves()}}
Base Happiness
{{getBaseHappiness()}}
Capture Rate
{{getCaptureRate()}}
Egg Groups
{{getEggGroups()}}
Growth Rate
{{getGrowthRate()}}

components.name: SearchFilterComponent
StatCardComponent
components.templateData:
Base Stats
{{getStatHeading(stat.stat.name)}}
{{stat.base_stat}}
